0.text: Innate: Kennen's abilities apply a stack of Mark of the Storm to affected enemies for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing upon applying the second stack. Upon applying 3 stacks to a target, the stacks are consumed to  stun them for 1.25 seconds and restore  25 energy.

1.text: If the  stun is applied to a target more than once within 6 seconds, its duration is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Kennen throws a charged shuriken in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

Passive: Basic attacks grant a stack of Electrical Surge  on-attack, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, Kennen's next basic attack on-hit consumes all Electrical Surge stacks to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of  Mark of the Storm to the target.

1.text: Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity to all nearby enemies afflicted by  Mark of the Storm or caught in  Slicing Maelstrom, dealing them magic damage.

2.text: A nearby enemy with  Mark of the Storm or within  Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be  visible to be affected.

0.text: Active: Kennen transforms into a ball of electricity, becoming unable to declare basic attacks but becoming  ghosted and gaining  100% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Lightning Rush can be recast after 0.5 seconds for its duration, and does so automatically after its duration.

1.text: While transformed, Kennen deals magic damage to all enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores  40 energy if he damages at least one enemy.

2.text: Recast: Kennen ends Lightning Rush and gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

3.text: Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

0.text: Active: Kennen summons Shuriken Storm, a magical storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and striking bolts of lightning down on all nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds, each bolt dealing magic damage.

1.text: Each maelstrom hit applies a  Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3 per unit.

2.text: Slicing Maelstrom deals 10% increased damage with each successive strike against a target, up to a maximum of 150% damage with one strike.

1.concerningText: Active: Kennen throws a charged shuriken in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

2.concerningText: Passive: Basic attacks grant a stack of Electrical Surge  on-attack, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, Kennen's next basic attack on-hit consumes all Electrical Surge stacks to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of  Mark of the Storm to the target.
Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity to all nearby enemies afflicted by  Mark of the Storm or caught in  Slicing Maelstrom, dealing them magic damage.

3.concerningText: While transformed, Kennen deals magic damage to all enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores  40 energy if he damages at least one enemy.

4.concerningText: Active: Kennen summons Shuriken Storm, a magical storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and striking bolts of lightning down on all nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds, each bolt dealing magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
